forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 13 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 58. West southwest wind 12 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

weather_report:
Today in Downtown San Francisco, the sky radiates with a mostly sunny disposition, inviting you to step outside and feel the gentle caress of the west-southwest winds. As the sun ascends, aiming for a high near 70 degrees, the air promises warmth, though with a hint of cooling grace as temperatures ease back to around 68 by the afternoon. The brisk breeze, blowing in at 13 to 24 mph with occasional gusts that flirt with 30 mph, carries a lively energy, perfect for those who appreciate a little nature's exuberance.

As twilight approaches, expect the horizon to turn its face, cloaking the city in a predominantly cloudy embrace, which will nestle temperatures down to around 58 degrees. Dine al fresco if you can, indulge in the rich textures of the evening air, perhaps with a light sweater or jacket at hand to counter the cooling winds. Today’s weather beckons you to explore, perhaps with a stroll along the Embarcadero or a leisurely visit to the Ferry Building Marketplace, where the bustle blends with the inviting aromas of fine cuisine. Wandering through the inviting lanes of North Beach may reveal a cozy café where a warm cup awaits, perfect for savoring as the soft clouds gather, stilling your evening adventures with a touch of mystery and charm.
